metadata.title: Ancient Cookware, Mexican Clay Jarrito Mug, 10 Ounces
features: Made of natural clay and certified lead free and completely safe for food use.
Can be used on gas, electric or glass stovetops, as well as the oven, microwave, or grill
Handcrafted by our artisans in Hidalgo Mexico
Great for both hot and cold beverages
description: Our hand-made Mexican Jarrito is great for hot or cold beverages, like Jarrito Loco. The clay keep the heat or cold temperature for a long time, and nothing like sipping hot Mexican chocolate with it. Length 4.75 in (including handle), Width 3.25 in, Height 3.75 in, Diameter 2.75 in (opening) and Capacity 10 oz (filled comfortably without overflowing).
